The researcher, if the seas, were made, and it was shown, and its sides were made, so what is between it is still from the parking, and the torment was mixed with the chicken, and it became a single sea, and the water is narrated, and the water was narrated.The sailors of the sailor, so they can be fired; That is, in that there is no water, and I want that the seas is one first and then the land is preserved, and it will be fired without water, and it is necessary to want to contain the water after the water of the water.To say the exalted: Do not see in it a wave or a nation, and read the Mujahid and the rabid ibn Khayqmah and al -Za`frani and al -Tori: Also: “I died” with a building for the acting in the sense of the lifting of the pulp from the vocabulary, in view of his saying: “They do not want to be overwhelmed.
